description:
Ashibe-kun gets into a fight with Sugao-kun. He goes over to his house to apologize, but he isn`t sure if Sugao-kun is even at home, so he sends Goma-chan in to check. So Goma-chan sneaks into the yard... only see a golf ball flying toward him! He dodges the ball, but knocks over the potted plants in the yard! Oh, no! Will Ashibe-kun and Sugao-kun ever make up?!
Source: crunchyroll
